alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 3:58AM MDT until March 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Kimball County and Cheyenne County. In Wyoming, East Laramie County. The highest accumulations are expected south of Interstate 80. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
